actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to improve the health of children and help better understand and enhance awareness about unexpected sudden death in early life.
short_title: Sudden Unexpected Death Data Enhancement and Awareness Act

titles.title: Sudden Unexpected Death Data Enhancement and Awareness Act
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to improve the health of children and help better understand and enhance awareness about unexpected sudden death in early life.
